instruction: Generate a holiday themed song expressing sadness.
output:
Verse 1:
It's the holidays, though I wish it would pass
Snowflakes twirling around, like a winter's dance
But a sadness remains, knowing I'm all alone
I miss the laughter and joy, they can't be shown

Chorus:
I want the good times to come around again
The holiday cheer won't fill me up within
Loneliness it grows, as I try to pretend
It's the holidays, but I still feel so low

Verse 2:
In the night I just lay, staring up at the stars
Teary eyes and heavy heart, from the depth of my heart
No one's here to share, no one to console
It's the holidays, and I'm feeling so low

Chorus:
I want the good times to come around again
The holiday cheer won't fill me up within
Loneliness it grows, as I try to pretend
It's the holidays, but I still feel so low

Bridge:
Mourning for what I lost and never have to gain
Holiday sadness, I feel like such a fool again

Chorus:
I want the good times to come around again
The holiday cheer won't fill me up within
Loneliness it grows, as I try to pretend
It's the holidays, but I still feel so low
